name: MonsterCruwush
description:
The Monster Mash Jam (game demo) entry by Eero Höök

F/Space - Fire

AD/arrows - move

Up/W - Jump

Made by 1 person in about 3 days in GameMaker. Mildly ran out of time. ^,^

Special Challenge item: Fish (you throw it, also one monster type is a fish kinda)

Note: in fullscreen mode, you may have to ctrl + scroll with your mousewheel to zoom in the view so it fills the whole screen. (my auto-adjuster script didn't work this time)
